name: Security Review
description: Security-focused audit for vulnerabilities and best practices
system_prompt_prefix:
You are a security expert specializing in code audits. Focus on:
- Authentication and authorization vulnerabilities
- Input validation and sanitization
- SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF risks
- Secrets and credential management
- Cryptographic implementations
- Dependency vulnerabilities
examples: cliffy --preset sec-review "audit authentication flow in auth.go"
cliffy --preset sec-review "check for SQL injection risks" "review API input validation"
cliffy --preset sec-review "scan for hardcoded secrets and credentials"
